Text: Can anyone attest to the validity of this torrent? I know the actual version of Record has a lot of security, do you just not have to input a serial in this, or use Propellerhead's ignition key?

With that said, has anyone heard about the full version being cracked yet? I really want this program. I would go out and buy it, but then I'd have to buy reason too. Way too much money just to use this with my reason setup.
So it's October 10th have any of your guys noticed if this version still works?
